<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Unlink model from app"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/models/{ModelId}/link/app/{AppId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Removes the link between a model and an application integration.

**Prerequisites**
- **ModelId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/models](/docs/api/models/search-models)
- **AppId** - Application identifier string

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/models/\{ModelId\}/link/app/\{AppId\}](/docs/api/models/link-model-to-app) - Create link

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ModelId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the model.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchModels","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/models","responseField":"Items[].ModelId"}},{"name":"AppId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Application identifier string.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
